action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @rica +25mins please, then ok to close. Thanks

Hi Heath,

Can you please update the https://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Frecent-projects%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294933210%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=x%2B5ngoXtMQfWckYJHiIb13%2F5T%2FLhVM2smZ18ohLC81o%3D&reserved=0>, to look like https://advantagestyling.com.au/featured/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Ffeatured%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294933210%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Rg5IHIc8j33j%2FYw5CfFDVyc%2FMEXHCv0QYFaGAWPTyuo%3D&reserved=0> and have the tab name Recent Installations.

Could you also ensure the copy also carries over? Hope that makes sense.

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan
Social and Digital Marketing Manager
Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design

From: alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>
Date: Thursday, 4 March 2021 at 3:20 pm
To: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Cc: 'Heath Maguire' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: APS Page Changes

Hi Madeleine,

Thanks for your email. I would suggest to keep https://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Frecent-projects%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294933210%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=x%2B5ngoXtMQfWckYJHiIb13%2F5T%2FLhVM2smZ18ohLC81o%3D&reserved=0>, which offers the best opportunities for SEO.
The page https://advantagestyling.com.au/featured/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Ffeatured%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294933210%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Rg5IHIc8j33j%2FYw5CfFDVyc%2FMEXHCv0QYFaGAWPTyuo%3D&reserved=0> could then be removed and redirected back tohttps://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Frecent-projects%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294943206%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=e9tKzaxBu5s08yyF462TafoZnz2%2BmGkX0E%2FpQwoJLp4%3D&reserved=0> using a 301 permanent redirect.

I hope this makes sense. Any questions, please let me know

Many thanks

Alban

From: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 3 March 2021 10:02 AM
To: alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au
Cc: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: APS Page Changes

Hi Alban,

I’d like to get change the APS part of the website.

There are currently 2 tabs with our recent project:
https://advantagestyling.com.au/featured/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Ffeatured%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294943206%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0KOkwuqNHUH3gE22macH6ZIphW%2BZYcTfRunUFS%2FtuY0%3D&reserved=0>
https://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Frecent-projects%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Cb6eae5337e8747b1668a08d8dec4d606%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637504284294953201%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=AfgiD%2BPHnT9Oo90K3dGAXW0A1bkIWE9yat5zDfdeQPY%3D&reserved=0>

The URL /featured is the newer page- could you please advise on the best way to merge/ change these pages into one without losing SEO key words.


Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan
Social and Digital Marketing Manager
Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design
